europeana:record.dc:title: The Southeast European Hypnophila species (Mollusca: Gastropoda Pulmonata: Cochlicopidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Gittenberger E.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Mollusca
Cochlicopidae; Hypnophila; taxonomy; Yugoslavia; Greece
europeana:record.dc:description: The four Southeast European Hypnophila species are characterized conchologically. Their ranges are indicated on the basis of reliable records and summarized in a distribution map. The nomenclature is revised: a neotype is selected for H. polita (Porro, 1838), a lectotype is selected for H. pupaeformis (Cantraine, 1835), and a persistent error in the interpretation of H. zacynthia (Roth, 1855) is corrected.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: The Southeast European Hypnophila species (Mollusca: Gastropoda Pulmonata: Cochlicopidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 67) (Issue 37)
